author: vors
body:
We use **mc.exe** for Full build to compile native resources and it fails in CI
https://ci.appveyor.com/project/PowerShell/powershell/build/0.4.0.2558#L206 (this is build from master)

There are two problems:
- [ ] Fix the failure
- [ ] Find out why it didn't fail the build and fix this: such errors must fail the build

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Consolidated all the things about `pwrshplugin.dll`, including mc.exe in #1155

title: Message Compiler fails in AppVeyor
